name: Not There Yet [Infinite Runner]
description:
Made in 1 week for 

GameDev.tv Community Jam

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-community-jam

Theme was 'TIME': so try to run as long and far as you can.

It is an infinite runner, with 3 type of maps generated randomly each time. 

COMING SOON ON GOOGLE PLAY STORE

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Hecho en 1 semana para

GameDev.tv Community Jam

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-community-jam

El tema era 'TIEMPO': así que trata de correr el mayor tiempo y lo más lejos que puedas.
Es un "Endless Runner", con 3 tipos de mapas generados aleatoriamente cada vez.

PRÓXIMAMENTE EN LA GOOGLE PLAY STORE

---------------------------------------------------------------------
